title: TOURRAMIT 304 Stainless Steel Toilet Brush & Holder- Replaceable Brush Head, Efficient Cleaning - Ergonomic Thickened Handle ，Durable- Silver
features: 【Premium and Durable】The handle and brush holder of the stainless steel toilet brush are made of premium 304 stainless steel, which is rust-proof and corrosion-resistant. The internal structure of the brush holder is made of ABS, which is easy to clean and ensures long-term use even in humid bathroom environments.

【360° Effective Deep Cleaning】 The stainless steel toilet brush has a flexible brush head with excellent elasticity and flexibility. It can adapt to toilets of all shapes and sizes, easily reach every corner of the toilet, effectively remove dirt, and give you a clean, spotless toilet.

【Replaceable Brush Head】 The brush head is made of PP (Polypropylene) material, with dense, durable and elastic bristles, which can quickly remove stains in the corners of the toilet edge groove. It is environmentally friendly and can reduce waste by simply replacing the brush head.
【Ergonomic Thickened Handle】 The thickened handle enhances comfort and control, reducing fatigue during use.

【Elegant Appearance】The stainless steel toilet brush has an elegant, stylish modern design that blends seamlessly into any bathroom decor, adding a touch of sophistication to your bathroom. It is easy to assemble and includes a sturdy stand for compact storage.

【12-month quality guarantee】Our stainless steel toilet brush comes with a 12-month quality guarantee. If you encounter any quality issues during the warranty period, please feel free to contact us. We will provide you with the best customer service.
description: Product Description TOURRAMIT 304 stainless steel toilet brush and holder 360° Efficient Deep Cleaning Handle made of 304 stainless steel Thickened handle ends ensure a comfortable grip and prevent accidental slipping 304 stainless steel holder Multiple manufacturing processes, seamless, like a work of art The brush head is easy to clean. The bristles are dense and durable, with moderate hardness, and can effectively clean the toilet. Made of high quality 304 stainless steel, durable, rust-proof and wear-resistant.
